SELECT e.id as id, e.allocate_num as allocateNumber, e.STATUS as status, s.full_name as consignee, s.email as email, s.tel_number as phone FROM ope_allocate e JOIN ope_sys_user_profile s ON e.consignee_id = s.id and s.dr = 0 WHERE e.id =#{enter.id} and e.dr = 0

SELECT r.id as id, r.assembly_number as allocateNumber, r.status as status, s.full_name as consignee, s.email as email, s.tel_number as phone FROM ope_assembly_order r JOIN ope_sys_user_profile s ON r.consignee_id = s.id and s.dr = 0 WHERE r.id = #{enter.id} and r.dr = 0

SELECT b.id as id, s.cn_name AS cnName, s.en_name AS enName, s.parts_number AS productNumber, s.parts_type AS productType, s.parts_qty AS qty, e.price AS price FROM ope_allocate_b b JOIN ope_parts s ON b.part_id = s.id and s.dr = 0 JOIN ope_price_sheet e ON s.id = e.parts_id and e.dr = 0 WHERE b.allocate_id = #{enter.id} and b.dr = 0

SELECT b.id as id, s.cn_name AS cnName, s.en_name AS enName, s.product_number AS productNumber, s.product_type AS productType, s.sum_parts_qty AS qty, e.sales_price as price FROM ope_assembly_b_order b JOIN ope_parts_product s ON b.product_id = s.id and s.dr = 0 JOIN ope_regional_price_sheet e ON s.id = e.parts_product_id and e.dr = 0 WHERE b.assembly_id = #{enter.id} and b.dr = 0

SELECT sum(aa.count) from ( select count(*) AS count FROM ope_stock s JOIN ope_parts_product b ON s.materiel_product_id = b.id and b.dr = 0 JOIN ope_regional_price_sheet e ON b.id = e.parts_product_id and e.dr = 0 WHERE s.dr=0 AND s.whse_id IN (#{defaultParam.purchas},#{defaultParam.assembly}) AND s.materiel_product_type in (#{defaultParam.combination},#{defaultParam.scooter}) AND e.currency_unit = #{defaultParam.fr} UNION SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ope_stock s JOIN ope_parts p ON s.materiel_product_id = p.id and p.dr = 0 JOIN ope_price_sheet e ON s.id = e.parts_id and e.dr = 0 WHERE s.dr=0 AND s.whse_id IN (#{defaultParam.purchas},#{defaultParam.assembly}) AND s.materiel_product_type in (#{defaultParam.parts},#{defaultParam.battery},#{defaultParam.accessory}) AND e.currency_unit = #{defaultParam.fr} ) aa
